page.title: 19GAMES IN THE VILLAGE
page.content: On a night after school we go to play down the Back Lane. Down there is a farm yard owned by Mr. Swiers who also owns many tractors. The games we play are scramble, blocky and tig. We just start to play when the boss comes down in his Subaru 4WD. He stops us and kicks us out of the yard. Up near the cricket field was a BMX course which we made but now are not allowed in. In the Main St. there is a village pump called The Fountain where we sometimes play tig. When it is hot you cannot see because of the sun shining straight at the fountain. At Peter Allan's it is good for playing "Fox Off"when you find one group and after you let them go you follow and tig them. We are not supposed to play round the building site. The village lacks facilities for childre Simon Rushworth.
